PathOfBuilding.Notes: -haven't filled out all the rares or whatever. maybe i can get some/a lot more damage from fine-tuning the gearing, but i'm not really sure how to -build caps out block (can maybe drop a reckless defense) real quick with violent retaliation. have to fiddle with it in-game to see how quickly block is stacking up -wings of entropy -pros: -big block chance -super cheap -passives from dual wield and two hand both apply, giving the build some very convenient pathing while allowing it to pick up 200% life -cons: -fire and chaos damage are a big part of the weapon's base damage, but can't find a way to reasonably scale them on skill tree -therefore, damage is pretty ass -pob says brutality is the best support to use, getting rid of the fire and chaos damage entirely
